short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extensions for counting Github issue point/estimate with a flexible options and customizations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple to use and customizable extension for summing GitHub issues estimates.

Features highlight : 
- Editable regex expression to match the estimation in the issue label.
- Optional highlighting of the non estimated issues.

Feature request are very welcome.
